title: Timeless Polki Diamond Drop Earrings - Apoorva Jhumka
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features uncut Polki diamonds of varying sizes and shapes
with brilliant-cut diamond accents. High clarity diamonds
features: Classic cascading drop design featuring three distinct sections: a circular top, followed by a smaller circular diamond, leading to a pear-shaped bottom. Intricate settings showcasing the beauty of uncut polki diamonds with interspersed brilliant cut diamonds for added sparkle. The design incorporates elements reminiscent of Mughal-era craftsmanship, giving it a regal appeal.
colors: complemented by the sparkling white of the Polki and brilliant-cut diamonds.
occasions: and other formal events. Can also be worn for traditional ceremonies like Muhurtham
or any grand celebration where you want to showcase a touch of heritage and elegance.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship using traditional Hyderabadi techniques. Features high-quality uncut Polki diamonds, known for their unique character and brilliance. A timeless design that blends heritage with modern sensibilities. The antique gold finish adds a touch of vintage charm. Perfect statement piece for a bride or anyone who appreciates fine traditional jewelry.
